text: Nasrin Akter Nipun (known as Nipun Akter) is a Bangladeshi movie actress. She has won the National Film Award twice. Nipun entered into the movie industry in 2006. ==Awards and nominations== Year Award Category Movie Result 2007 National Film Awards Best Supporting actress Saajghor 2010 National Film Awards Best Supporting actress Chader Moto Bou 2011 Meril Prothom Alo Awards (Critics') Best Supporting actress Adorer Jamai == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:People from Dhaka Category:Bangladeshi movie actors Category:Recipients of Bangladesh National Film Awards
title: Nipun Akter
